segments.text: Observing this scene, the woman seems so unaware of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying that plate, towel bunched up in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink overflow is ridiculousâ€”water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking the floor and cabinets; what a sloppy situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddle looks uncomfortable and gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are raiding the cookie jar like little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is grabbing handfuls, stool wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Crumbled cookie bits might fall into that wet floor mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up adds to the disorderly vibe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All this in a kitchen that should be clean and tidy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window view of the garden is the only neat part.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's disappointing to see such carelessness in a home.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the potential damage that's building up.
segments.speaker: PAR
